Top/Classifieds/Job Market/Job Categories/Sales and Business Development

abstract.p: Jose Ignacio Arroyo acquires town house in Weston, Fla, in first fully electronic mortgage loan and home purchase; loan is provided by Irwin Mortgage Corp through Mortgage.com and sold to Fannie Mae; titled documents are signed and fees transmitted electronically; EOriginal, supplier of technology to authenticate transactions and insure deal, says up to 100 similar deals are set over coming month (S)

block.p: In what participants assert was the first fully electronic mortgage loan and home purchase, a Procter & Gamble manager acquired a three-bedroom town house in the Fort Lauderdale, Fla., suburb of Weston yesterday. The loan to the buyer, Jose Ignacio Arroyo, was provided by the Irwin Mortgage Corporation of Indianapolis through Mortgage.com and sold to Fannie Mae. The paperless transaction included all filings with Broward County. Title documents were signed and fees transmitted electronically. EOriginal, which supplied the technology to authenticate the transactions and insured the deal, said up to 100 similar deals are set over the next month.
